Product Development+Research and Develop.EXPLANATION: Evaluates vehicle performance based on criteria such as speed, handling, and durability.
Measures the safety performance of a vehicle based on crash tests and safety assessments.
Measures the frequency of engineering change orders during the development phase.
Product Development+Research and Develop.FORMULA: (Number of Engineering Change Orders / Total Changes) * 100

Product Development+Research and Develop.EXPLANATION: Measures the average time taken from the initial design phase to the market launch of the vehicle.
Product Development+Research and Develop.FORMULA: Total Time from Vehicle Design Completion to Market Launch

Product Development+Research and Develop.EXPLANATION: Measures how well the actual production costs of a vehicle adhere to the budgeted costs.
Measures the fuel efficiency of a vehicle based on metrics like miles per gallon (MPG).
Measures the percentage of vehicles that meet environmental emissions standards.
Measures customer satisfaction specifically with vehicle design elements.
Product Development+Research and Develop.FORMULA: (Sum of Customer Satisfaction Ratings on Vehicle Designs / Number of Customers)
